Reason: The configuration 'includeAndroidLdpiTvdpi' does not directly involve any performance-related operations that are time-expensive or memory-expensive within its related code. It simply determines whether to include ldpi and tvdpi density descriptors in the list of AndroidDensityDescriptors. The impact of this configuration is limited to the list of descriptors returned by the 'getAndroidDensityDescriptors' method and does not lead to notable performance variations at the system level. Therefore, it is not considered performance-sensitive.
